person.persName: Thomas C. Westfall (Mason County teacher and postmaster)

body.p: Mason County teacher and postmaster. Native of Ohio. Postmaster of Minerva 1862-1866.

bibl.p: “Westfall, Thomas C.,” Spring Grove Cemetery, http://www.springgrove.org/stats/98954.tif.pdf. Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport – Microfilm (before 1911), Ancestry, Covington, Deaths, 1901, no. 15722. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Carroll County, Washington, p. 107. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 3, p. 69. Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971, Ancestry, vol. 28, p. 137.
